alert.note: Alert for Gogebic; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 17 at 4:37AM EDT until October 17 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow will result in hazardous winter driving conditions for the morning commute. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches are expected. Northwest winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Snow will diminish this afternoon. * WHERE...Ontonagon, Gogebic and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. Gusty winds and wet snow could bring down tree branches, resulting in sporadic power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Since this is the first winter storm of the season, extra caution is urged for those who must travel.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
